articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Record numbers not working due to ill health - BBC
articles.description: Mental health issues and back and neck pain have contributed to the rise in long-term sickness.
articles.content:
The number of people not working in the UK due to long-term sickness has risen to a new record, official figures show.
More than two and a half million are not working due to health problems, the Of… [+5356 chars]
